alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 2:51AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IBERIA... SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN VERMILION AND WEST CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 330 AM CST... At 251 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erath, or near Abbeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Abbeville, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Loreauville, Cade, Meaux, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Coteau, and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
